SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: The ID of the target subscription.

ApiVersionParameter.name: api-version
ApiVersionParameter.description: The API version to use for this operation.

ResourceGroupNameParameter.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupNameParameter.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.

ForceDeleteSnapshotsParameter.name: x-ms-delete-snapshots
ForceDeleteSnapshotsParameter.description: Required if the Volume has associated snapshots

ForceDeleteVolumesSnapshotsParameter.name: x-ms-delete-volumes-snapshots
ForceDeleteVolumesSnapshotsParameter.description: Required if the Volume Group has associated volumes and snapshots

ForceDeleteVolumeGroupsParameter.name: x-ms-delete-volumegroups
ForceDeleteVolumeGroupsParameter.description: Required if the San has associated Volume Groups

SnapshotNameParameter.name: snapshotName
SnapshotNameParameter.description: The name of the snapshot within the given subscription, resource and volume group.

SnapshotCreationData.description: Data used when creating a disk.

sourceUri.description: If createOption is Copy, this is the ARM id of the source snapshot or disk. If createOption is Restore, this is the ARM-like id of the source disk restore point.

SourceCreationData.description: Data used when creating a disk.

createSource.description: This enumerates the possible sources of a volume or snapshot's creation.

sourceUri.description: If createOption is Copy, this is the ARM id of the source snapshot or disk. If createOption is Restore, this is the ARM-like id of the source disk restore point.

TargetCreationData.description: Data used when creating a disk.

targetUri.description: Target location for the source to be copied or exported

ProvisioningState.description: Provisioning state of the iSCSI Target.

EncryptionType.description: The type of key used to encrypt the data of the disk.

values.description: Volume/Snapshot is encrypted at rest with Platform managed key. It is the default encryption type. This is not a valid encryption type for disk encryption sets.
Volume/Snapshot is encrypted at rest with Customer managed key that can be changed and revoked by a customer.
Volume/Snapshot is encrypted at rest with 2 layers of encryption. One of the keys is Customer managed and the other key is Platform managed.

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives.

id.description: Resource ID of a subnet, for example: /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{groupName}/providers/Microsoft.Network/virtualNetworks/{vnetName}/subnets/{subnetName}.

action.description: The action of virtual network rule.

state.description: Gets the state of virtual network rule.
